page.title: 16GAMES AT SCHOOL
page.content: A favourite playground game is hopscotch. The playground has numbered squares painted on it. You throw a stone. The stone must land on the number you are up to. Then you hop on all the numbers except the one with the stone on it, you jump over this square. You pick up the stone on the way back and then throw the stone onto the next number. If your stone does not land on the number you are up to, you miss a go. Another favourite school game is called Tig. You run after a person and tap him on the back. Then he must chase people. We all like ball games. Our playground is marked out as a netball court. The boys love to play football and use one of the school walls as a goal. We have a pitch but even though it has been drained, it is usually waterlogged in winter. Skipping is very popular.
